backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing sequential readings with add, list, latest, and simple DTO helpers plus a hello endpoint.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing through readings and nextId unchanged from old to new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to show the new /status endpoint and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing components, hooks, utilities, config, and deployment notes.
frontend/DEPLOY_FRONTEND_ONLY.md: Guide for performing a clean frontend-only rebuild and redeploy with env.json considerations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme defining color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the frontend bundle with optional runtime canister ID injection.
frontend/public/env.json: Fallback runtime config file containing backend canister ID fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app showing login controls, HTTP instructions card, latest reading, and full readings table with refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/HttpLoggingInstr: Component resolving backend canister ID and displaying log, readings, data, and status HTTP URLs with copy and open controls plus error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an auth context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch all readings or the latest reading from the backend actor with polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers and converting bigint timestamps into readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeConfig.ts: Resolves the backend canister ID using multiple fallbacks and caches the result for runtime use.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and dark mode setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, known issues, and pending requests for adding a /status HTTP endpoint.
